#summary Details about installation process
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Installation instructions =
  # Install the Metasploit Framework with the choosen database (SQLite3, PostgreSQL, MySQL) : https://community.rapid7.com/docs/DOC-1296
  # Download XSSF from the SVN (svn checkout http://xssf.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ xssf-read-only) or from the last packaged version
  # Copy and paste all downloaded files into the Metasploit /msf3/ folder
  # Enjoy !
